system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Space 4 (creating invisible force servant + close range)  
**Supporting Energy:** Time 3 (duration 1 hour)  
**Range:** Close, 30 ft.  
**Duration:** 1 hour  
**Total Cost:** 7 Energy  
**Action:** Complex weave (2 actions)  
**Weaving Roll:** Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery  
**Effect:** Create invisible, mindless, shapeless force within close range. Has AC/DR 2, 4 HP, Strength 2, can't attack. Can perform simple tasks: fetch, clean, mend, fold, light fires, serve food. Can carry 30 lbs or drag 60 lbs. Command as [Minor] action. Moves 15 feet per round. Vanishes if reduced to 0 HP or when weave ends.  
**Saving Throw:** None (creates servant)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 10 minutes, 2 = full effect, 3 = 8 hours, 4 = can create 2 servants (or 1 servant with Strength 4)  

---
